dublin_core.dcvalue: Although nonadherence research in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease COPD lags well behind other diseases new evidence helps inform understanding about the degree and underlying causes of patient nonadherence interventions that can improve adherence and areas of research needed to further progress in improving this problem in patients with COPD
Nonadherence in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patients: what do we know and what should we do next?
